trans-unit.note: After this text, the program will display the path to the conversion file (the location of the file on this computer). The conversion file specificies a mapping which is used to convert the script for one language into the script for another.
This text is shown if an error occurred while running eSpeak. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).

After this text, the program will display the language code of the language settings that eSpeak used. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).
After this text, the program will display the text of the current text box after being converted into the script of another language using the settings in the conversion file.
trans-unit.target: Uwach ri k'exenem pa uwi’ ri taqatz’ib’anik:

alt-trans.target: Uwach ri tzijonem pa uwi’ ri suk’ tz’ib’:

trans-unit.source: Funded by the local community only
The code should look like SOMENAME-123456-7890
trans-unit.target: Ri retal rajawaxik k’o ri q’inb'al B’I’AJ-123456-7890

alt-trans.target: Ri retal rajawaxik k’o ri q’in B’I’AJ-123456-7890

trans-unit.source: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.
trans-unit.target: Bloom wokk’ayinel kuya uwi’ ri chak xuquje’ upatanisaxik chi nim upatan chi kech le ja k’iyirisanem taq wuj, q’atab’al taq tzij rech amaq’, wokaj ajch’aqaja’ taq tinamit ri kepe wi xuquje’ nik’aj chik. Ri tz’ib’axik rech b’i’aj tojom chik, ya’talik kril ri rajawaxik chi iwech xuquje’ ktob’an chech ri k’iyirisanem rech Bloom chi kech konojel ri komon ri kekojowik.

alt-trans.target: Bloom wokk’aynel kuya uwi’ ri chak xuquje’ patanisaxik che nim upatan chi kech le ja k’iyirisanem taq wuj, q’atab’al taq tzij rech amaq’, wokaj ch’aqaja’ taq tinamit kepe wi xuquje’ nik’aj chik. Ri tz’ib’axik b’i’aj tojom chik ya’talik kril ri rajawaxik iwech xuquje’ kto’b’an che ri k’iyirisanem rech Bloom chi kech konojel ri komon ri kekojowik.

trans-unit.source: None. Enterprise features will be unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Man k'o ta jun Bloom man kk’ut ta ri chak wokk’ayinel.

alt-trans.target: Man k'o ta jun. Bloom man kk’ut ta na ri chak wokk’ayinel.
Majun. Bloom man kk’ut ta na ri chak wokk’ayinel.

trans-unit.source: In an older version of Bloom, this project used **%0**. To continue to use this you will need to enter a current subscription code. Codes for SIL brandings can be found [here](%1). For other subscriptions, contact your project administrator.
trans-unit.note: %0 will be replaced with the name of the branding. Keep surrounding **...**. [here](%1) will become a hot link; %1 will not be seen, but will be the URL for the destination page. Translate "here" and keep the [](%1) around it.
trans-unit.target: Pa jun ub’anik okib’al kanoq rech Bloom, we ch’ob’om chak xukujo **%0**. Rech utaqaxik ukojik rajawaxik katok ruk’ ri awetal xya’ik are taq xatz’ib’aj ab’i' kamik ri’. Ri retal rech k’utb’alil rech SIL kariqitaj pa [here](%1). Rech nik’aj chik tz’ib’am b’i’aj, rajawaxik katzukuj ri rajch’ab’em k'amal b'e rech ri ch’ob’om chak.

alt-trans.target: Pa jun ub’anik okib’al kanoq rech Bloom, we ch’ob’om chak xukujo **%0**. Rech utaqaxik ukojik rajawaxik kat tok ruk’ ri awetal xya’ik are chi’ xatz’ib’aj ab’i kamik ri’. Ri retal rech k’utb’alil rech SIL karaqataj pa [here](%1). Rech nik’aj chik tz’ib’am b’i’aj, rajawaxik katzukuj ri rajch’ab’em k'amalb'e rech ri ch’ob’om chak.

trans-unit.source: That code appears to be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Le retal pacha’ man are ta ub’e.

alt-trans.target: Are la’ retal pa cha’ ne man are ta ub’e.

trans-unit.source: This version of Bloom does not have the artwork that goes with that subscription.
trans-unit.target: We okib’al ub’anik rech ri Bloom man k’o ta chi upam ri jalajoj taq wachib’al chi b’enaq ruk’ utz’ib’axik b’i’aj.

alt-trans.target: We okib’al ub’anik rech ri Bloom ma k’o ta chi upam ri jalajoj taq wachib’al che b’enaq ruk’ utz’ib’axik b’i’aj.

trans-unit.note: A link offering more information about the Funded Local Community Only option
